Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory155.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'The guy controlled the performer puppets in the market, huh...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'That suspicioso is gone, Captain!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After getting rid of the manipulated puppets, Chrome and Kamui find themselves being confronted by a strangely-dressed figure.'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Why are you following me? And how did you get on the ship?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mask-wearing Construct is the figure that Chrome was following. He seems to have the ability to control the performer puppets too.'}
{3: 'Chrome sends Kamui a glance, and they both put their weapons down together.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "We're the Strike Hawk Squad from Babylonia. I'm Chrome, and this is Kamui.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "We're here on the ship to seek intelligence, especially concerning AI systems.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'Wait, why are you telling him everything?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray, who has been listening at the side, suddenly interrupts nervously, not understanding why Chrome did what he did.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Because... the guy isn\'t giving off "killing intent".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Killing intent...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Yep. The will to kill! It's a kind of signal that Capt's specialized device can detect.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "To put it simply, we can tell that this guy ain't here for a brawl.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Replying in the place of Chrome is a grinning Kamui.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Just leave it to him!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Babylonia... I think I've heard of that before... or did I? Well, I can tell you something about AIs, though.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The masked man replies and extends his right hand to Chrome, who grips it in a firm shake.'}
{2: '???', 3: "You're not asking anything first?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Can't lead a team if I can't handle a handshake.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The two, despite looking hostile before, seem to have come to a silent agreement. At least from Murray's perspective."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "What's with the two...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Come to think of it, you've been in contact with someone, haven't you? Can you introduce this person to me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Of course. Murray, it's okay to share your communications with him, right?", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Oh, well, yeah. I'll leave it up to you to decide.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Murray smiles, a bit resigned, and allows his visual system to be synced up with the masked man's."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'I see now. An operator of sorts, huh.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "My name is Chaofeng. I'm one of the KCC Kowloong Crew.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'So this ship is indeed owned by the KCC, huh?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "It used to be... but it's now fully under the control of the AI system you're looking for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Under the control of an AI...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'The AI management system on the ship known as "Huaxu" was developed by the KCC. Huaxu is in charge of planning the ship itinerary and performing all kinds of missions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'It\'s pretty much the "mastermind" of the whole ship. But something happened during the lengthy seafaring journeys...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Huaxu shackled all the members on the vessel and implanted control codes directly, thus controlling the whole ship.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'A Gestalt-related AI system... doing something like this? What is it trying to do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'To become human. With its power, it forbade all from leaving the ship and re-planned the itinerary so that it would sail on forever, all to force people into finding a shell it could inhabit.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "It's trying to implant its mind onto a machine or something?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Onto Constructs. Its first target was our leader, Qu...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "So she's now...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "She hasn't lost her body... but she became a marionette controlled by the system.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "So everyone's been basically stuck in an endless nightmare, with their every move controlled by that AI...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Yeah. But today will be the end of this nightmare. Another Kowloong crew member and I have made plans to retrieve our leader, Qu.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'What good does that do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "She has access to the main control room, where Huaxu's core lies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "So you want to destroy Huaxu's core inside. Is that it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Yes. I can't directly attack Huaxu, as I'm under its control. But you can! And the ones we invited from somewhere else can too.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'So you already have help?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Yes, but we need all the help we can get.', 4: '1'}
